org.gradle.tooling.model.idea

Interface IdeaModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element, HasGradleProject, HierarchicalElement, Model, ProjectModel

    public interface IdeaModule
extends HierarchicalElement, HasGradleProject
    Represents information about the IDEA module.
    Since:
    1.0-milestone-5
